name: Paracetamol
comments: Pain reliever and fever reducer, with food

name: Ibuprofen
comments: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug; assists in reducing swelling and inflammation

name: Cetirizine
comments: Antihistamine that treats hay-fever-like alleries and symptoms

name: Salbutamol
comments: Assists in the treatment of asthma by relaxing muscles in the airways, and increasing airflow to the lungs
